WITW _airgroup.csv: No.1 SAAF FB Sqn, line 1452
metadata.notes: Tier 2 extraction (72% confidence). Commander Major le Mesurier returned to squadron September 1942 after being shot down 4 July 1942. Hurricane Mk.IIC aircraft received mid-September 1942 with modified 2x20mm cannon armament (outer cannons removed). Squadron tasked with protecting Allied armor during El Alamein breakout phase, destroying multiple Ju 87 Stukas. Transitioned to Spitfire Mk.VC in late November 1942 after battle. Personnel and ordnance estimates based on standard RAF/SAAF fighter squadron establishment 1942.
metadata.witw_validation: Confirmed in WITW _airgroup.csv line 1452 as 'No.1 SAAF FB Sqn' with airType 667
